content: cross tie it off with the starting tail and bury both ends in the starting round before trimming the ends making the tassel to go into the tassel loop wrap the thread around 4 fingers on your non-dominant hand i use my left hand making sure to wrap with an even firmness but not tight and keep the thread smooth make 23 wraps and hold the tail with your pinky finger against it cut thread with your other hand straighten the cross and tassel loop pressing it flat place your crochet hook going from front to back into the chain 7 tassel loop then scoop the 23 wraps at the top of your index finger onto the crochet hook hold the wraps tightly with your dominant i use my right hand and move your left hand out with the wraps halfway on each side of the tassel loop scrunch one side together and puff the other side out enough to pull the whole bundle of wrapped thread through pull evenly until tight now cut the ends and your project is finished for best results with cotton thread wet block or iron flat much of the finishing is difficult to explain so i have made a video to show the making of the entire cross you may follow this link to view crochet cross with tassel c looped d lu 2025 4
